issue: Inefficient memory usage when processing large files
old_code:
lines = file.readlines()
        for line in lines:
new_code:
for line in file:
            if line.strip():
benefit: Reduces memory usage by reading the file line by line instead of loading the entire file into memory at once. This is especially beneficial for very large files that may not fit in memory.
commit_message: Optimize memory usage when processing large files
